rules: Rule1: If the Organization assigns the job Planting to the Volunteer, then the Volunteer completes the job Planting.
Rule2: Either the Organization assigns the job Planting to the Volunteer, or the Manager supervises the job of the Volunteer.
Rule3: If the Garden hosts the exhibition ArtShow, then it does not attract Many visitors.

Rule4: Either the Garden hosts the exhibition ArtShow, or, under the condition that the Organization operates in the Garden, if the Garden has the facility Greenhouse, then, whenever the Manager supervises the job of the Volunteer, the Volunteer completes the job Planting.
Rule5: If the Organization organizes the event ArtShow, then, provided that the Garden hosts the exhibition ArtShow, it attracts Many visitors.
Rule6: Either the Organization cancels the event ArtShow, or it organizes the event ArtShow.
Rule7: If the Volunteer waters the plant Tomato, then the Volunteer fertilizes the plant Tomato.
Rule8: If the Tomato grows into a Healthy plant, then it is not the case that the Garden displays the artwork Mural.
Rule9: Under the condition that the Volunteer fertilizes the plant Tomato, the Tomato grows into a Healthy plant.
Rule10: If the Volunteer completes the job Planting, then, whenever the Organization does not have the grant Grant, it receives funding from the Grant.

Rule11: If it is not the case that, if the Volunteer plants the crop Tomato, then either the Organization manages the job of the Volunteer, or, under the condition that the Organization does not have the grant Grant, it receives funding from the Grant, then the Organization maintains the facility Greenhouse.

Rule12: If it is not the case that, if the Volunteer plants the crop Tomato, then either the Organization manages the job of the Volunteer, or, provided that the Organization does not have the grant Grant, it receives funding from the Grant, then the Organization does not maintain the facility Greenhouse.
Rule13: If the Organization does not have the grant Grant, then the Garden displays the artwork Mural.
Rule14: Provided that the Organization does not have the grant Grant, the Volunteer waters the plant Tomato.
facts: Fact1: The Garden has the facility Greenhouse.
Fact2: The Organization operates in the Garden.
Fact3: The Volunteer plants the crop Tomato.
Fact4: It is not the case that the Organization receives funding from the Grant.
Fact5: The Organization does not cancel the event ArtShow.
Fact6: The Organization does not manage the job of the Volunteer.

question: The Organization has the grant Grant.
